body.name: Acrylic Cutting Boards for Kitchen Counter,Clear Acrylic Cutting Board with Counter Lip（17x13 in）
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 16 hrs 2 mins
features: Convenient and Practical Design: Our acrylic cutting board offers a convenient and practical solution for your kitchen needs. The transparent design allows for easy monitoring of your cutting and food preparation. It features non-slip feet to ensure stability during use, keeping the cutting board securely in place on your countertop.

Durable and Long-lasting: Crafted from premium acrylic material, this cutting board is built to withstand daily use. It is designed to resist scratches and maintain its clarity over time. The sturdy construction ensures it won't warp or bend, providing a reliable cutting surface for all your culinary tasks.

Versatile and Efficient: From chopping fruits and vegetables to slicing bread and preparing ingredients, our acrylic cutting board is versatile and suitable for a variety of kitchen tasks. Its generous size, measuring 17 x 13 inches, offers ample space for comfortable and efficient cutting. The 1.5-inch lip helps contain spills and keeps your countertop clean.

Easy to Clean and Maintain: Cleaning this cutting board is a breeze. Simply wash it with mild dish soap and water, then dry it thoroughly. Avoid using harsh cleaners or abrasive materials that can damage the surface. The non-porous acrylic material resists stains and odors, making it easy to maintain and ensuring a hygienic food preparation surface.

Sleek and Modern: With its clear acrylic design, our cutting board adds a sleek and modern touch to your kitchen. It complements any countertop and allows the beauty of your kitchen to shine through. It's not only a practical tool but also a stylish addition to your culinary space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My New Black Acrylic Cutting Board
reviews.reviewText: This black acrylic cutting board is pretty stylish for a cutting board. Its solid black material really stands out on my kitchen counter. Not too big, not too small – just perfect for my daily fruit slicing adventures. I'm the unofficial fruit salad master in my family, so this board has become my trusty sidekick. When it arrived, both sides were covered with a protective film, which I thought was a thoughtful touch. It keeps the surface pristine and scratch-free. The thickness is just right too – it feels durable without being bulky. It's like the Goldilocks of cutting boards, not too thick, not too thin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clear Acrylic Cutting Board
reviews.reviewText: I've got this acrylic cutting board, and it's pretty great. Clear and sturdy, it fits right onto my counter with a handy lip to catch spills. It's roomy for all my chopping needs, and cleanup is super simple. Sure, it gets a bit crowded sometimes, but that's a small price for such a handy kitchen tool. It's become an essential part of my cooking routine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Arrived damaged, very tough to get plastic off, left scratches ... poor quality for the price. No instructions for care and etc. Very disappointed and the size is not what is shown!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars protective coating hard to remove
reviews.reviewText: It's nice that the product comes with a "protective" coating, HOWEVER, it is almost impossible to remove. I still haven't been able to remove all of it. I used a razor blade to start the removal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight cutting board
reviews.reviewText: The acrylic cutting board is a versatile kitchen tool that suits various purposes. One of its notable features is its substantial thickness, making it an excellent choice as a temporary cutting surface for fruits and vegetables. Its thickness adds durability and stability, enhancing its usability in the kitchen. The ease of cleaning is another advantage, offering a hassle-free solution for maintaining a hygienic kitchen environment. The black color, which I opted for, not only imparts a sophisticated and high-end appearance but also exhibits resistance to stains, making it a practical choice for daily use. Furthermore, the anti-slip design is a thoughtful addition, ensuring that the cutting board stays securely in place on the kitchen countertop during food preparation. This feature adds an extra layer of safety and convenience, preventing any unwanted movement while chopping or slicing. In conclusion, this acrylic cutting board stands out for its thickness, easy cleaning, sophisticated black color, and anti-slip design. It proves to be a valuable addition to the kitchen, providing a reliable and aesthetically pleasing surface for various culinary tasks. Whether you're chopping, slicing, or dicing, this cutting board offers a practical and stylish solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks great in our kitchen, works as advertised
reviews.reviewText: This cutting board really solves a small problem for us - our other cutting boards are not always big enough, and none of them look good left on the counter. This is both attractive and large enough for almost every use and can be left out. The non-slip "bumpers" that come with it work like a charm, and seem impervious to being cleaned.As expected, and ass you can see in the photo, the board scratches with ease. Just setting expectations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This acrylic cutting board is a great choice for anyone who spends a lot of time in the kitchen. The 17x13-inch size provides plenty of room for all my chopping needs, from vegetables to meat, making meal prep a breeze. But what really sets this board apart is the counter lip, which hugs my kitchen counter and ensures the board stays in place no matter how hard I chop. Acrylic materials are not only beautiful; It provides a clean, hygienic surface, is easy to maintain, and doesn't dull my knives.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This acrylic cutting board was a nice addition to our kitchen and barbeque. My husband likes to use the cutting board to prep his meats and vegetables before he heads to the grill. This board is a good cutting board. It does a good job protecting our counters. It is also lightweight enough to be easily carried out to the grill fully loaded. The board looks and feels like it is solidly constructed and should last a long time. A great option for a cutting board that does a good job protecting our counter surface.
